Params: {1: 'Sometimes you wonder if the person in the mirror is really you—your face, your different past...', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 7: '-2', 10: '1'}
{1: 'What truly makes you you? Where is the self? Does it even exist?', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 7: '-1', 10: '1'}
{1: "No one knows their own ending, or who's pulling the strings of fate.", 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 7: '-1', 8: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: 'An emperor can command his people, parents can shape their kids,', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 7: '-3', 10: '1'}
{1: 'but you can still choose your fate. Only you can truly steer your life.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 7: '-1', 9: '1', 10: '1'}
{3: 'As the memories grow whole and clear, the pain returns to her body.'}
{3: "Being lost in this cocoon-like sandbox isn't an accident. It is her will and her need. She has to end it."}
{3: "Someone waits here for her, but many outside guide her, believe in her, and hope she'll follow her heart."}
{3: "She realizes time doesn't matter here. Certain moments keep going, rewind, and remain. They're everywhere. They're the meaning."}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "I want war to end. You'd rather live in endless war... because you believe you'll always be a step ahead, always the winner."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Eleanor', 3: "After all you've been through, you can't still believe in human nature, can you?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Eleanor', 3: "They're born to fight, without end. Even without the Punishing Virus they'd find other reasons. Babel Tower is fated to be humanity's coffin.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Eleanor', 3: "War may end for a while, but not forever. Stay here. I'll keep you company...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: 'Now I have the freedom to choose.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Eleanor', 3: "...Are you abandoning me? You won't do to me what you hate most, will you?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She raises her hand and feels red threads of the past pass through her heart, take on the color of emotion, and stitch themselves into a beloved scissor shape.'}
{1: '1', 2: '<color=#ffffffff><size=50>"I hope someday... you can stitch your life into the shape you want."</size></color>', 4: '50', 9: '3', 11: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: '"I hope someday... you can stitch your life into the shape you want."'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: "It's not abandonment—it's a goodbye that was always going to happen...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "I won't be afraid of goodbyes anymore.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Forgetting would be easier, but she gathers all her strength and tightens her chest.'}
{3: 'She raises the scissors. A clear, cool ripple rises in her heart. She knows this is her new self.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: 'Virtual or dream—if I accept it as real, then it is real.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: 'I\'m going to find her—the master of the "sandbox."'}
{3: 'The sandbox is quietly changing. It began to change long ago.'}
{3: 'Insults, failures, rejections—they never truly had power.'}
{3: 'A simple truth appears: you were never meant to be a puppet. You were meant to hold the strings.'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "The one who chooses, cuts the past, steps forward, and embraces hope—that's me."}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "So I won't stay here. I'll move on to what's next—something I choose..."}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "No, this time it's not a mission... it's my wish!"}
{3: 'Amid tangled layers of illusions, she smashes the window and drops straight out of the sandbox.'}
